tag_message: Release of 3.3 to the app market
Release of 3.2 to the Android market
Lots of fixes from 3.0 release (see bugsense)

Fixed poller issues
Added device view
Cleaned some bits up
Fixes reported issue #2 - Allowing longer polling duration
Fixes the issue with 1.4 null pointer for adapter
Bug fixes and improvements for 1.4 release to market
